title: League problem
body: I was playing solo queue and was in the middle of a game when my ping spiked to 500 from literally nowhere. I checked my internet and it said it was fine. I waited for about 5 minutes for it to reconnect then tried to leaving and reconnecting but it just took me back to the regular client instead  the reconnect screen and im really confused.

replies.body: Could be packet loss if it was sudden like this.  Run a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) so we can get a better overview of your case.  The results should also include some troubleshooting steps too, but let me know what you find!
